name: Allspice Alexander
description: The vintage-cocktail expert Ted Haigh considers allspice dram an ideal “secret ingredient”: A small amount can add tremendous depth and flavor to many classic drinks. Here, I use it to perk up the otherwise staid — if indisputably delicious — Brandy Alexander.

recipeInstructions.text: Shake brandy, crème de cacao, allspice dram and cream vigorously with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Grate a very small amount of nutmeg on top.
